select c.id as id, c.content as content, c.create_date as createDate, c.update_date as updateDate, a.review_avg as reviewAvg, u.full_name as username, u.nickname as nickname, u.profile_picture_name as profilePictureName from REVIEW_COMMENTS c join USERS u ON c.owner_id = u.id join ( select customer_id, AVG(rating) AS review_avg FROM REVIEWS GROUP BY customer_id ) a ON u.id = a.customer_id where review_id = #{value} ORDER BY c.create_date DESC
